attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the light of failing public support as demonstrated by the local elections and the Crewe and Nantwich by-election 
The conservatives won the seat with 20,539 votes, comfortably ahead of Labour’s Tamsin Dunwoody on 12,679 votes.
Please do the decent thing and call an election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
